name: Speedly
author: Jerre Baumeister

sections.description: This is the Official Speedly.io WordPress plugin to help optimize your WordPress website for the Speedly network.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin file
  2. Extract the speedly-for-wordpress.zip file
  3. Upload the speedly directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Go to settings -> speedly in your WordPress admin, and add your Speedly token to the settings field.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Updates to the jQuery codebase
  • Serveral bug fixes
  • Enhanced security

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: The Speedly plugin helps you purge Speedly's cache after you update your Wordpress content
description: This is the Official Speedly.io WordPress plugin to help optimize your WordPress website for the Speedly network.
